channel.title: Does anyone have the game which i think is called fantasy?
channel.description:
after playing an old favourite "jill of the jungle"(thanks paul t and miss silabsoft), i remembered another dos game which i think was called fantasy. i dont remember much about it but i remember you have a small group of characters, and you can pick from gnomes, warlocks (i think), thiefs, lizard men.. thats all i remember. but you basically go around fighting monsters and stuff, i remember something about traps, and the thief can steal stuff off enemies. everyones health is represented by a body, each body part goes from green to yellow to red to gone when damaged. and if a character dies, on the fighting screen instead of the character theres a headstone. also i remember something about a gnome bow, the best bow in the game. and when you get enough exp to level up you pick skills to level.
thats all i can remember about the game for now, but if someone can post it for me so i can play it on XP i would really appreciate it.

item.title: Does anyone have the game which i think is called fantasy?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Lol, how do they even find these topics to bump… Do they deliberately click on the 20th page, find a thread and post on it?

Anyway now that it’s bumped, I did find the game. The reason why I couldn’t find it for so long was because it’s spelled “Phantasie”

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have the game which i think is called fantasy?

where do i go to to play the game

after playing an old favourite “jill of the jungle”(thanks paul t and miss silabsoft), i remembered another dos game which i think was called fantasy.
i dont remember much about it but i remember you have a small group of characters, and you can pick from gnomes, warlocks (i think), thiefs, lizard men… thats all i remember.
but you basically go around fighting monsters and stuff, i remember something about traps, and the thief can steal stuff off enemies.
everyones health is represented by a body, each body part goes from green to yellow to red to gone when damaged.
and if a character dies, on the fighting screen instead of the character theres a headstone.
also i remember something about a gnome bow, the best bow in the game.
and when you get enough exp to level up you pick skills to level.

thats all i can remember about the game for now, but if someone can post it for me so i can play it on XP i would really appreciate it.
